title: Betsy's wedding
creator_credit: Alan Alda, Martin Bregman, Louis A. Stroller and Touchstone Pictures
brief_description: Directed by Alan Alda, “Betsy’s wedding” is about a father (Alda) who must survive his daughter’s wedding, with all its fractious factions, complications, cost, deal making and emotional turmoil. An intermittently amusing work, with the highlight being Anthony La Paglia’s turn as a mobster’s nephew who falls for the bride’s policewoman sister. Cast also includes Joey Bishop, madeline Kahn, Molly Ringwald, Joe Pesci, Ally Sheedy.
